message: I have a great opportunity for you, Bob. I'm willing to sell this fantastic product to you for $10000. It's a steal at this price, considering how much it's worth to you.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I can see the value you place on this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $9500?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really trying to stick to my budget, and I think this product is worth it to me at that price. Would you be willing to go down to $9000?
